description:
A girl sings a song, and her father is sacrificed.  A son is tasked with taking his mother to the mountains, where she will left to die.  A tense hostage situation at a sumo wrestler`s dojo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Monoiwanu Okiku / Ubasute Yama / Sumoutori no Imouto
Unspeaking Okiku / Ubasute Mountain / The Sumo Wrestler`s Little Sister
もの言わぬお菊 / うばすて山 / 相撲取りの妹
